targets.expr: sum by(pod, kubernetes_io_hostname) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{id!="/", pod!="", container!="jnlp", namespace=~".*", pod!~"node-exporter.*", pod=~"$pod"})
sum by(pod, kubernetes_io_hostname, device) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{id!="/", pod!="", namespace=~".*", pod!~"node-exporter.*", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod, kubernetes_io_hostname, device) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{id!="/", pod!="", namespace=~".*", pod!~"node-exporter.*", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod, kubernetes_io_hostname) (container_network_receive_bytes_total{id!="/", pod!="", container!="jnlp", namespace=~".*", pod!~"node-exporter.*", pod=~"$pod"})
- sum by(pod, kubernetes_io_hostname) (container_network_transmit_bytes_total{id!="/", pod!="", container!="jnlp", namespace=~".*", pod!~"node-exporter.*", pod=~"$pod"})
